snippet: More than 20 of the approximately 80 people kidnapped in Cameroon during a cross-border attack by gunmen suspected of being members of the group Boko Haram have been freed, a Defense Ministry spokesman said.
lead_paragraph: More than 20 of the approximately 80 people kidnapped in Cameroon during a cross-border attack by gunmen suspected of being members of the group Boko Haram have been freed, a Defense Ministry spokesman said.

headline.main: Cameroon: Army Says Some Captives Seized by Gunmen Have Been Freed
headline.print_headline: Cameroon: Army Says Some Captives Seized by Gunmen Have Been Freed
